channel.title: How to make a shop have an item of unlimited supply with the icon?
channel.description:
Hey, Does anyone know how to make a shop have an item of unlimited supply with the icon? By icon I mean the unlimited icon I don't like the numbers as it doesn't look good in my opinion.
Thanks, Mr Rushed

item.title: How to make a shop have an item of unlimited supply with the icon?
item.dc:creator: @bend_over_and_spell bend over and spell run
item.description:
@bend_over_and_spell wrote:

Bro, it would be a lot easier to just make the supply 9999

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a shop have an item of unlimited supply with the icon?
